channel.title: mini on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in mini on Joost Plattel

item.title: Retrofitting an old iPod Mini
item.description: After owning a couple of mp3 players in my youth, I’ve made the jump to an Apple device with an iPod Mini as my music player. Sadly, it’s in no working condition anymore I’m sure it’s possible to replace the entire inside, but it’s more fun to do something else with it. Thus and idea was born that didn’t come into fruition until a couple of days ago when I had some time available.
